A

afterInvocation(Object, CallSite) - Method in class org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.MethodInvokerTemplate
Called immediately after invocation, allowing for post-processing of the return value.

B

beforeInvocation(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.MethodInvokerTemplate
Called immediately before invocation, this method must generate a CallSite for the invocation, whose return value (i.e., the result of calling CallSite.dispatch()) will be passed to MethodInvokerTemplate.afterInvocation(Object, org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.CallSite) for post-processing prior to returning it to the caller.
beforeInvocation(Object, Method, Object[]) - Method in class org.nebularis.defproxy.introspection.TargetSiteWrapper

P

ProxyArguments - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Provides annotations for passing additional string arguments to a ProxyDelegated method in order to modify the parameter array during dynamic dispatch.
ProxyConfiguration - Class in org.nebularis.defproxy.configuration
Holds the mapping between a MethodSignature on a proxy interface and a MethodInvoker that handles calling the delegate object behind the interface.
ProxyConfiguration() - Constructor for class org.nebularis.defproxy.configuration.ProxyConfiguration
 
ProxyConfigurationBuilder - Class in org.nebularis.defproxy.configuration
Builder for proxy handler configurations.
ProxyConfigurationBuilder(Class<?>, Class<?>) - Constructor for class org.nebularis.defproxy.configuration.ProxyConfigurationBuilder
 
ProxyDelegated - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
This annotation explicitly marks a method as delegated, allowing you to specify the underlying method name or provide an invocation handler class.
ProxyExceptionHandling - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Indicates an exception handling policy is set, wrapping all raised errors in an exception of the defined type.
ProxyExceptionHandlingPolicy - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Indicates an explicit exception handling policy is being set, for the MethodInvoker to use at runtime.
ProxyFactory - Interface in org.nebularis.defproxy
Basic interface for a proxy factory.
ProxyInjected - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
TBC: support dependency injection in interface specifications.
ProxyInterface - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Maps a proxy interface to a specific back-end "delegate" class.
ProxyInterfaceAnnotationProvider - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Provides a means for writing your own annotation in place to the ProxyInterface marker.
ProxyInterfaceValidator - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Allow you to annotate an interface to specify a type to act as a validator for delegates.
ProxyTypeConverter - Annotation Type in org.nebularis.defproxy.annotations
Provides a means for ProxyDelegated decorated methods to return a different type than that of the mapped method to which they delegate at runtime.
